title: Help me sell my furnitures due to moving
original_prompt: Can you help me to write a facebook marketplace post for used AirDoctor 3000 purifier
input1: For sale: gently used AirDoctor 3000 air purifier in excellent condition! I purchased it a year ago for $600, but I'm moving and need to downsize. This purifier has been a game changer for my allergies, effectively removing dust, pet dander, and other pollutants. It comes with all original accessories and the filter is still good for several months. Asking for $350 or best offer. Local pickup only in downtown area. Message me for more details or to arrange a viewing!
input2: Selling my AirDoctor 3000 air purifier, which has been a lifesaver for my family's health! We bought it six months ago for $650, but we’re redecorating and no longer need it. It features advanced filtration technology and is perfect for large rooms. The unit is in like-new condition, and I have the original box and manual. Priced at $400, but I'm open to reasonable offers. Pickup in the suburbs or I can deliver within a 10-mile radius. Contact me if you're interested!
input1_ans:
🌬️ **For Sale: AirDoctor 3000 Air Purifier** 🌬️

I'm selling my gently used AirDoctor 3000 air purifier, which is in excellent condition! I bought it a year ago for $600, but I'm moving and need to downsize. 

This purifier has been a game changer for my allergies, effectively removing dust, pet dander, and other pollutants from the air. It comes with all original accessories, and the filter still has several months of life left!

💰 **Asking Price:** $350 or best offer  
📍 **Location:** Local pickup only in the downtown area

If you're interested or have any questions, feel free to message me for more details or to arrange a viewing. Don’t miss out on this great deal for cleaner air! 🌟
